sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Cadmium-Safe Kids Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Cadmium-Safe Kids Act.

sections.heading: Legislative findings. The General Assembly finds:
sections.text: Legislative findings. The General Assembly finds:

sections.heading: Regulation of cadmium in children's jewelry
sections.text: No person may manufacture, knowingly sell, offer for sale, distribute for sale, or distribute for use in this State children's jewelry containing cadmium in any paint or surface coating or accessible substrate that exceeds 75 parts per million, as determi

sections.heading: Interstate clearinghouse. The Agency is authorized to participate, along with other states and governmental entities, in an interstate clearinghouse to promote safer chemicals in consumer products
sections.text: The Agency may cooperate with the interstate clearinghouse to (i) organize and manage available data o

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
